q: Chris Bryant, who believes he may have been a victim of the phone hackers, said Friday he welcomed the decision to re-examine the case, adding that it should not have been closed last month. The evidence that this goes far deeper than one rotten apple has continued to stack up, and so a fresh pair of eyes looking at the case is very welcome, he said. Bryant said the police had ''severely'' damaged their credibility by failing to properly investigate earlier. Andy Coulson and the News of The World have denied the charges. The

Drew Brees returns today for his fifth Pro Bowl as a backup to NFC starter Michael Vick , and continuing to participate when invited remains important to him. It is, definitely, because it's a lot of fun and I think it's a great representation of the league and we want to show the fans a good time, Drew Brees said yesterday. failure of Microsoft's hostile takeover bid for Yahoo has caused the Wall Street Journal to publish a report calling for a sell-off of the company's stock. In a hard-hitting opinion piece, Brett Arends writes: Now is an excellent opportunity to sell any Microsoft stock you have left. same. Despite his support for Barack Obama , Colin Powell would make no commitment yet for the 2012 John McCain House race. ''I will always vote for the person who I think is best qualified,'' he said. I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates. I have not yet seen anybody on the Republican side that I am ready to commit to and I am not committed to Barack Obama either.
